const Status = ({bmi,fat,calorie,plan,week,level}) => { var color = " " var cat = " " bmi=15 if(bmi <= 18.5 ){ color = "rgb(134 177 217)" cat = "under weigth" } else if(bmi <= 24.9) return (

Body mass index


{bmi}

-{cat}

Body fat percentage %


{fat}%

Average calorie intake(needed)


{calorie}kc

Exercise plan


{plan}

Week


{week}

Diffculty


{level}

) } export default Status
